price: Sana booda coba bishaan saalaa kan iddoo tasgabbaa’aa, mijaa'aa (gadaamessa) keessatti isa taasifne.
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ نُطۡفَةٗ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnāhu nuṭ'fatan fī qarārin makīnin
